title: Red.Faction.Guerrilla.Steam.Edition.MULTi8-PLAZA
description:
PLAZA
                      -P-R-E-S-E-N-T-S-
         Red Faction: Guerrilla - Steam Edition (c) Volition

Date ................................................... December.2014
Size ........................................................ 1xBluRay
Languages .................................... EN/DE/FR/IT/ES/PL/CZ/RU
Protection ..................................................... Steam

Set 50 years after the climactic events of the original Red Faction,
Red Faction: Guerrilla allows players to take the role of an insurgent
fighter with the newly re-established Red Faction movement as they
battle for liberation from the oppressive Earth Defense Force. Red
Faction: Guerrilla re-defines the limits of destruction-based game-
play with a huge open-world, fast-paced guerrilla-style combat, and
true physics-based destruction.
> Steam Edition main features:
- DirectX 11 Render Backend instead of DirectX 10 (DirectX 9 still
available as fall back)
- Added Wrecking Crew maps: RUINS, REPURCUSSION, IMPERIAL, EXPANSION,
FROST, ABANDONED
- Added Behemoth Mode
- No Games for Windows Live sign-in required
- Added Russian, Polish and Czech Localization
- Various Stability improvements

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the folder /PLAZA
5. Play

Notes: If you want to force starting the game in DX9 mode through the
rfg_launcher.exe, just start the game using rfg.nodx11.exe
